diff --git a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1250.json b/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1250.json
index 718265993..9a779239f 100644
--- a/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1250.json
+++ b/.project-roadmap/issues-db/upstream/1250.json
@@ -10,17 +10,24 @@
   "created_at": "2019-01-04T10:48:34Z",
   "github_updated_at": "2019-01-04T13:36:43Z",
   "body_snippet": "<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->\r\nIt would be really useful to have a couple of 'smart' connection groups or folders which are separate to the opened connections file. These are most useful when you working with a large number of connections / folders.\r\n\r\n- Connected - shows all connections currently connected to. Makes it easier to switch to the correct tab when many tabs open\r\n- Recent - shows connections recently used (e.g. last 10 or 20). Makes it easier to...",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P3-enhancement",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-17",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Smart connection groups (connected, recent) improve navigation for users with many connections, a common UX request inspired by RDCMan."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [],
   "comments_cursor": "2019-01-04T13:36:43Z",
   "unread_comments": 0,
   "needs_action": false,
   "waiting_for_us": false,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (claude): Smart connection groups (connected, recent) improve navigation for users with many connections, a common UX request inspired by RDCMan.\nApproach: Add virtual smart group nodes (Connected, Recent) to the connection tree that dynamically populate from active connections and a recently-used history list, without modifying the persisted connection file."
 }
